content: ग्रासः [ग्रस् कर्मणि घञ्] {@--1@} A mouthful, a quantity of anything equal to a mouthful; <ls>Ms. 3. 133</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">6. 28</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 55.</ls> {@--2@} Food, nourishment. {@--3@} The part of the sun or moon eclipsed. {@--4@} The morsel bitten. {@--5@} The act of swallowing. {@--6@} Slurring, indistinct pronunciation; fault in the pronunciation of the gutturals. {@--7@} (In geom.) A piece cut out by the intersection of two circles. {@--8@} An eclipse.
